column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////As I always enter into a new place
column2: I do so with great excitement and a tinge of nervousness.  I just really want to enjoy all new experiences.  It was this past Sunday and yes
column4: it moved quickly but only to arrive at a counter that contained a menu that have several items crossed out and "sold out" written next to them.  The case still held a few almond croissants
column5: though.  That was all I needed
column6: but the arrival of the fresh cookies created an addition to my order.  Service was plentiful but not very attentive at all.  At first
column7: I just thought it was me
column8: but my section of the line
